question.name: MAA211 Ex05 Q4 (copy)
question.questiontext:
Exercise

A quarrying company has recently invested in a new conveyor belt which is used to load lorries with a particular aggregate. The time to complete loading, along with weights loaded are given for ten lorry loads in the table below:


 
  Weight loaded (tonnes) Time (secs) Weight2 Time2 Weight × Time
  {@weight[1]@} {@time1[1]@} {@weight[1]^2@} {@time1[1]^2@} {@weight[1]*time1[1]@}
  {@weight[2]@} {@time1[2]@} {@weight[2]^2@} {@time1[2]^2@} {@weight[2]*time1[2]@}
  {@weight[3]@} {@time1[3]@} {@weight[3]^2@} {@time1[3]^2@} {@weight[3]*time1[3]@}
  {@weight[4]@} {@time1[4]@} {@weight[4]^2@} {@time1[4]^2@} {@weight[4]*time1[4]@}
  {@weight[5]@} {@time1[5]@} {@weight[5]^2@} {@time1[5]^2@} {@weight[5]*time1[5]@}
  {@weight[6]@} {@time1[6]@} {@weight[6]^2@} {@time1[6]^2@} {@weight[6]*time1[6]@}
  {@weight[7]@} {@time1[7]@} {@weight[7]^2@} {@time1[7]^2@} {@weight[7]*time1[7]@}
  {@weight[8]@} {@time1[8]@} {@weight[8]^2@} {@time1[8]^2@} {@weight[8]*time1[8]@}
  {@weight[9]@} {@time1[9]@} {@weight[9]^2@} {@time1[9]^2@} {@weight[9]*time1[9]@}
  {@weight[10]@} {@time1[10]@} [[input:ans1]] [[input:ans2]] [[input:ans3]]
TOTAL [[input:ans4]] [[input:ans5]] [[input:ans6]] [[input:ans7]] [[input:ans8]]

 

  1. Complete the table and use it to find the intercept and slope of the linear regression line. (Do not round the answers for the table, but give the intercept and slope to 3 significant figures).

    slope = [[input:ans9]] [[validation:ans9]] [[feedback:prt9]]

    intercept = [[input:ans10]] [[validation:ans10]] [[feedback:prt10]]

     

  2. Predict the time, to 3 significant figures, taken to load

          {@var1@} tonnes: [[input:ans11]] [[validation:ans11]] [[feedback:prt11]]

          {@var2@} tonnes: [[input:ans12]] [[validation:ans12]] [[feedback:prt12]]

  3. Calculate the Pearson correlation coefficient for these data, to 3 significant figures

    \(r\) = [[input:ans13]] [[validation:ans13]] [[feedback:prt13]]

     

    [[validation:ans1]] [[feedback:prt1]]

    [[validation:ans2]] [[feedback:prt2]]

    [[validation:ans3]] [[feedback:prt3]]

    [[validation:ans4]] [[feedback:prt4]]

    [[validation:ans5]] [[feedback:prt5]]

    [[validation:ans6]] [[feedback:prt6]]

    [[validation:ans7]] [[feedback:prt7]]

    [[validation:ans8]][[feedback:prt8]]
question.generalfeedback:
FEEDBACK

a) n = 10, \( \Sigma x_i = {@totalweight@}\), \( \Sigma y_i = {@totaltime@}\) 

    \( \Sigma x_i^2 = {@totalweight2@}\), \( \Sigma x_i y_i = {@totalwt@}\)

Hence we can calculate the slope, \(b\), using: 

\[ b = \dfrac{n\times\sum_{i=1}^nx_iy_i-\sum_{i=1}^nx_i\times\sum_{i=1}^ny_i}{n\times\sum_{i=1}^nx_i^2-\left(\sum_{i=1}^nx_i\right)^2} \]

\(b\) = \( \dfrac{10\times {@totalwt@} - {@totalweight@} \times {@totaltime@} }{ 10\times {@totalweight2@} - {@totalweight@}^2 } \)

       = \( \dfrac{ {@10*totalwt@} - {@totalweight*totaltime@} }{ {@10*totalweight2@} - {@totalweight^2@} } \)

       = \( \dfrac{ {@10*totalwt-totalweight*totaltime@} }{ {@10*totalweight2-totaltime^2@} } \)

       = {@slope@} = {@ta9@} (3 s.f) 

    Using \( a = \bar{y}-b\bar{x} \) we first calculate

        \( \bar{y} = \dfrac{ {@totaltime@} }{ 10 } = {@float(totaltime/10)@} \) and \( \bar{x} = \dfrac{ {@totalweight@} }{ 10 } = {@float(totalweight/10)@} \)

    then we find that

        \(a\) = \({@totaltime/10@} - {@slope@} \times {@float(totalweight/10)@} \)

          = {@intercept@} = {@ta10@} (3 s.f)

b) If x = {@var1@}, Time = {@intercept@} + ({@slope@})({@var1@}) = {@intercept+var1*slope@}

                                         = {@ta11@} (3 s.f)

    If x = {@var2@}, Time = {@intercept@} + ({@slope@})({@var2@}) = {@intercept+var2*slope@}

                                         = {@ta12@} (3 s.f)

c) Using 

\( r = \dfrac{ n\times \sum_{i=1}^nx_iy_i - \sum_{i=1}^nx_i\times \sum_{i=1}^ny_i}{\sqrt{\left( n\times \sum_{i=1}^nx_i^2 - \left( \sum_{i=1}^nx_i\right)^2\right) \times \left( n\times \sum_{i=1}^ny_i^2 - \left( \sum_{i=1}^ny_i\right)^2\right) }} \)

We get

\(r\) = \( \dfrac{10\times {@totalwt@} - {@totalweight@}\times {@totaltime@}}{\sqrt{\left(10\times {@totalweight2@}-{@totalweight@}^2\right)\times\left(10\times {@totaltime2@} - {@totaltime@}^2\right)}} \)

      = \( \dfrac{ {@10*totalwt@} - {@totalweight*totaltime@}}{\sqrt{\left( {@10*totalweight2@}-{@totalweight^2@}\right)\times \left({@10*totaltime2@}-{@totaltime^2@}\right)}} \)

      = \( \dfrac{ {@10*totalwt-totalweight*totaltime@} }{\sqrt{ {@10*totalweight2-totalweight^2@}\times {@10*totaltime2-totaltime^2@}}} \)

     = \( \dfrac{ {@10*totalwt-totalweight*totaltime@} }{\sqrt{ {@(10*totalweight2-totalweight^2)*(10*totaltime2-totaltime^2)@} }} \)

     = \( \dfrac{ {@10*totalwt-totalweight*totaltime@} }{ {@float(sqrt((10*totalweight2-totalweight^2)*(10*totaltime2-totaltime^2)))@} } \)

     = {@float(unroundedta13)@}

     = {@ta13@} (3 s.f)

stackoptions.questionnote: ta1-ta8 are supposed to be entered unrounded. slope (ta9) = {@ta9@} intercept (ta10) = {@ta10@}, ta11 = {@ta11@}, ta12 = {@ta12@}, ta13 = {@ta13@}
